title: A would-be totalitarian on WND
author: VD
content_html:
The Rabbi declares that “It’s time to integrate America“:

While black America has ills for which it is personally accountable and must do everything to rectify – foremost of which is an out-of-wedlock birthrate of more than 60 percent, guaranteeing that untold numbers of black children are raised without fathers to nurture, guide and inspire them – white America still has a great many sins for which it must repent, foremost of which is white flight from neighborhoods that black residents move in to….

For many people, the purpose of religion is to gain entry into the afterlife. But for blacks and Jews, religion is about fighting persecution and creating heaven on earth.

So, the Constitutionally-protected right of Freedom of Association is declared a secular sin and under the aegis of the Rabbi Shmuley’s great vision, blacks and Jews are going to create heaven on earth. It’s seems that we’ve heard that promise more than a few times before. Such visions invariably end in creating Hell instead.

And isn’t it more than a little ironic for a Jew to preach integration? From what I understand of their centuries-old tradition, Jews are vehemently opposed to their children marrying non-Jews of any color.

Integration is a good thing as long as it is chosen freely by the individuals involved. Forced integration is a totalitarian abomination and is tantamount to affixing a fuse to a powder keg. It’s always only a matter of time before something sparks and the whole thing blows up. This isn’t just a black-white thing, it is true everywhere there are two different cultures forced together by the government policy. It’s as true in Denmark as it is in Malaysia.
